title: Sudden battery drain and unstable charge
content:
Hi,

I have been using the original pixel charger and cable since purchase. However, the battery has dramatically worsened the past few weeks. Recently, it has been significantly poorer (lasting half the time) and sometimes doesn't charge. I am currently traveling abroad for a few months and access to a good smartphone camera is important. I have read the help forums and nothing helps. The problem persists and is a major issue. 

Have tried help centre chat but isn't available.

Would greatly appreciate your help with this. 

Many thanks in advance.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
